items.title: Review – Shelby Oaks (2025) hints at something different, but can’t keep its promises
bullets: • Shelby Oaks is a muddled, uneven experiment that never quite figures out what it wants to be
• It swings between cinematic sequences, faux-documentary interviews, and found-footage snippets with little sense of cohesion
• What starts as a promising premise erodes into a greatest-hits compilation of genre clichés

• Lightning has proven more elusive on our closest planetary neighbors

items.title: The origins of your dog's unique look may be older than you think
bullets: • By about 10,000 years ago, half of the amount of diversity present in modern dogs was already present in the Neolithic, researchers say
• The study was published in the journal Science
• It's commonly believed that this vast range in physical attributes is a product of the Victorian era

items.title: Thursday's Cold Moon Is the Last Supermoon of the Year. Here's How and When to View It
bullets: • On December 4, Earth's satellite will delight us with one of the last astronomical spectacles of 2025
• The term supermoon refers to a full moon that occurs when our satellite is at perigee, the point at which its orbit brings it closest to our planet
• It will be about 357,000 km away from us, making it the second-closest full Moon of the year

bullets: • Data centers that train and run large language models are fueling an artificial intelligence boom

• She is among the women in the fishing community of Trapaeng Pris who are rising up to protect their communal land
• The area was once home to 50 freshwater ponds - sources of drinking water, food and livelihood to those nearby

bullets: • A lot of people have compared Skeleton Crew to The Goonies, but I don't think that comparison holds up

• The themes of independence are there, and there are good ideas throughout

items.title: African leaders push for recognition of colonial crimes and reparations
bullets: • African leaders are pushing to have colonial-era crimes recognised, criminalised and addressed through reparations
• International conventions and statutes accepted by a majority of countries have outlawed practices including torture, torture and apartheid
• The United Nations Charter prohibits the use of territory by force but does not explicitly reference colonialism

items.title: EPA urged to ban spraying of antibiotics on US food crops amid resistance fears
bullets: • The agricultural industry sprays about 8m pounds of antibiotic and antifungal pesticides on US food crops annually, many of which are banned in other countries
• The overuse of antibiotics, which are essential to treating human disease, can lead to superbug bacteria that are antibiotic-resistant

items.title: An unsettling indie game about horses keeps getting banned from stores
bullets: • Horses, a first-person narrative horror game, was banned from the Epic Games Store just hours before it was set to launch on December 2nd
• Then, a day after launch, the Humble store banned it as well
• The decision shocked the developers at Santa Ragione, makers of the critically respected Saturnalia, as these storefronts were the homes they’d found for their game two years before
